item.title: Discord Stream Video Recorder - Upwork
item.description:
Discord Live Stream Recorder
Responsibilities:

Join and participate in a Discord live stream for 30 minutes to 1 hour each day.

Record the entire live stream session using reliable recording software.

Ensure high-quality audio and video during the recording.

Save the recorded file immediately after the session ends.

Upload the recorded live stream to the designated platform or storage location.

Follow the provided guidelines for file naming and organization.

Maintain a consistent and punctual daily schedule, including weekends.

Requirements:

Basic understanding of Discord and its live streaming features.

Proficiency with screen recording software.

Reliable internet connection for smooth streaming and uploading.

Ability to work independently and meet daily deadlines.

Attention to detail to ensure high-quality recordings.

Good organizational skills for managing and uploading files.

Availability to work 7 days a week.

Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience with live streaming or recording.

Familiarity with video editing software (for minor adjustments if needed).

Strong communication skills for coordination and reporting.

Additional Information:

This is a remote position.

The total daily commitment is approximately 30 minutes to 1 hour everyday.
Flexibility to accommodate varying live stream times if needed.

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 20, 2024 01:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Stream, Audio Recording, Screen Recording, Voice Recording
Skills: Video Stream, Audio Recording, Screen Recording, Voice Recording
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Ideator for Viral Short-Form Social Media Reels on TikTok and Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about ideating short-form viral video content? Do you know how to ideate and develop engaging videos that generate leads? We specialize in helping coaches reach new audiences on social media and grow their businesses through impactful 5-15 second videos. If you have a creative mind and a proven track record in ideating viral content, we want to hear from you!

Key responsibilities:
- Ideation for viral content: Develop innovative and engaging video concepts with high viral potential to drive lead generation for our coaches. Find viral content, understand why it went viral, and recreate the text from the viral video for the coaches we help.
- Text development: Create compelling and persuasive text for videos that captures the audience's attention and prompts action.
- Caption creation: Write strategic captions designed to convert viewers into leads, such as encouraging direct messages.
- Video editor management: Collaborate with video editors to ensure high-quality production using B-roll footage provided by our clients.

Example videos:
- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6UVGDvODr0
- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7ZPw1fRmIG
- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6tqb7GgvNQ
- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5nsdGTIzPx
- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6euCNuOghF

Qualifications:
- Proven track record in ideating viral short-form content.
- Strong creative thinking and writing skills.
- Ability to work collaboratively with video editors.

How to apply:
Please submit a portfolio demonstrating your experience in ideating viral content. Include examples of your work with coaches if applicable. Share links to 3 Instagram reels or TikToks you have ideated that you are most proud of and explain why.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 01:33 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Content Strategy, Content Writing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management
Skills: Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Content Strategy, Content Writing, Social Media Content, Social Media Management
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Strengthen a Growing Audience - Upwork
item.description:
Hello All,
          I am an inspiring YouTube content creator with little to no time to promote my own content. I am currently working full time with a 1-year-old and just need some help with marketing and broadening the scope for my channel on TikTok, Twitch, and YouTube. I have not streamed for a while, but I would like to still be able to promote that channel, but more importantly, to gain more watch time and loyal followed viewers.
         I am currently at5.11k subs on YouTube with plenty of videos to promote. On Twitch I am only at 200 or so but, again, stopped streaming a while ago but wanting to be able to get back into it. On TikTok I have close to 1.1k followers with a little over 1.5k likes on my videos.
         I am seeking someone who will be open minded to helping me grow and to better my future. By this, I do not mean editing my videos, however that may come down the line, but rather promoting by channel with all Seo marketing along with more advance tactics to grow subscribers and watch time that is from legitimate sources.
     I would like to ask anybody interested in my journey to be intrigued as opposed to helping for the money. Of course, I would be willing to pay for my success but would also like to be treated with respect, as I will treat you with respect as well.
     What I would expect is to be able to receive help to finally get my foot in the door and start having loyal followers. My niche involves a field that is already highly populated but this what I want to do and what I feel I am best at. That being said, others have walked the path to success following the same goals and standards set for themselves, as will I. Best practice involves asking others who have been successful in the past and present in order to guide me to success for both our futures.
Thank you all!

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 20, 2024 01:04 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Influencer Marketing, Internet Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Social Media Management, Influencer Marketing, Internet Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Trailer/Intro Video Edit - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, my name is Indi and I am looking for a Video Editor to help me film and to edit a short Video Podcast Trailer for my Podcast.

I am wanting to film a short (under 90 seconds) trailer for my podcast. I am looking for someone to help with ideas on creating an engaging trailer and to do all the editing for the trailer. The trailer will be a combination of me speaking and clips cut from previous episodes.

I am looking for:
-Fluent English speaker so I can understand your ideas and creative input
-Experience with video editing is a must. Experience editing prior Podcast Trailers is a bonus (please link your past work in your application)

In your application, you MUST:
a) View a couple of episodes of the Podcast https://www.youtube.com/@thementalwellbeingcollege
b) After viewing, briefly tell me your ideas of what an engaging Trailer for my podcast could look like.

Thank you!

Indi

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 20, 2024 00:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Trailer, Video Intro & Outro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Trailer, Video Intro & Outro, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply
